Summary: Observed a transparent disc shaped object moving silently from north to south.
divs: sighting detailsi was 7 years old when i witnessed what i can only describe as a transparent disc shaped object. it was late summer 1976.i can't recall the exact date. what i do recall clearly is this object traveling from the north and passing nearly over my head toward the south,slightly west of me. it was transparent in that what i saw was an outline of this disc and the cloud cover behind it as it moved. it was overcast and the sun was setting casting an orange glow on the western edges of the clouds. this object as it passed blended itself into the cloud cover only revealing the outline to me. mid way through the sighting i attempted to get the attention of my friend at the bottom of the hill i was standing on. i yelled his name at least 3x before i ran down to the bottom of the hill to find him w\his grandmother. they seemed to be catatonic. unresponsive. i ran back to the top of the hill to watch this object travel over the top of the tree line and out of sight. i ran back down the hill to find my friend now responding to what i was saying. i ran east pleading with my friend to follow me,thinking if i get to the rail road tracks that ran north to south i could catch one more glimpse of this object and so could my friend,but i didn't see it again. to describe my feelings during this i would have to say,i ran a full gambit of emotions. from excitement to disappointment,frustration to dismay and fear. during the first moments i felt extremely curious as to what i was seeing. when i realized i was alone to deal with what i was seeing,i felt,well,alone. i have since had two other sightings of varying objects. luckily i did have a responsive friend during one of these sightings to confirm that what i was seeing was really there. unfortunately he has lost his grip on reality in these recent years so his credibility is less than one would hope to have for a witness. i'm unsure if i should continue and describe the other sightings here or submit another separate sighting report. (1981 witnessed bent cigar) (1986 witnessed metallic sphere 20" off the ground with friend.)
